statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -16 \\ 8 \\ 4 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -20 \\ 12 \\ 7 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -13 \\ 52 \\ -27 \\ -14 \\ -11 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
